title: Avid.Pro.Tools.HD.v10.3.7-WIN
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                             Avid.Pro.Tools.HD.v10.3.7
                 --------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------Uploaded on TPB by Akun / ABOD Studios----------------------
               _______________________________________________________


Description :


Studio-standard professional audio recording and music creation software that includes everything you need to make music.
Includes a powerful bundle of virtual instruments including synths, drums, pianos, sampled instruments, and more.
Features tons of effects and plug-ins to shape your sound with guitar amp tones, EQ, sound processing, and more.
Avid Channel Strip plug-in offers the EQ and compression found in the acclaimed Euphonix System 5ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ¶one of the most sought-after recording consoles ever
Features advanced editing tools for crafting and perfecting your music to get the same tools the pros use.
Enjoy session compatibility with Pro Tools users and studios around the world exchange sessions and files hassle-free.
Use Pro Tools with a dedicated audio interface or your laptop sound card ultimate flexibility and portability.

More: http://www.amazon.com/Tools-Professional-recording-creation-software/dp/B0061ZPCUQ#productDescription


                ____________________________________________________


                             What's new from 10.3.5:
- Correction of many activation calls that were uncracked, thus a better stability while editing projects (Really better stability ! if not perfect)

- All the bullshit from the releases notes here : http://www.pro-tools-expert.com/home-page/2013/8/10/pro-tools-1037-update-now-available.html
                ____________________________________________________



THIS IS THE WINDOWS VERSION ONLY (x86 + x64) Tested on W7 x64 and w8 x64 personally.


                ____________________________________________________



Instructions:

CAUTION FIRSTLY YOU HAVE TO UNINSTALL ALL YOUR PREVIOUS AVID STUFF RELATED TO PROTOOLS.

[IF ANY SETUP ASKS FOR SYSTEM RESTART, ACCEPT IT]

________________________________________

UNINSTALL ANY PREVIOUS PROTOOLS SOFTWARE:

To do so, close Protools, go to Start, Control Panel, Uninstall a program.
Choose ProTools and in the setup uninstall SPECIFYING THAT YOU WANT TO UNINSTALL THIS :
AVID DRIVER, SETTINGS, EVERYTHING.

Then Download CCleaner (or run it if you have)

And go to the tab "Tools" and then "Uninstall", Select every Pace antipiracy shit that you see and uninstall it too.
Go to the "Registry" tab, scan for issues, click on "fix selected issues" AND REPEAT this step 5 times (until there is no more keys related to protools).

If you don't see any avid stuff that could harm Protools setup you can REBOOT.

Then go to Program Files [on 32-bit systems] or Program Files (x86) [on x64]

And delete avid folder.

Then it's finally clean
________________________________________

INSTALLATION


1. Install the pro tools setup (including pace anti-piracy driver which requires a reboot)

2. Restart after pace anti-piracy driver's installation.
   Install PT 10 (Native) keeping the default options and restart.

3. Then Install BETA PATCH 7 (TEAM V.R)

4. Run KillerBugs v3. and install by specifying the installed directory

For Windows 8 - Go to the installation folder of Pro Tools
(Pro Tools Installer/ISSetupPrerequisites),
Search and install:
Avid Core Runtime files, Avid HD Driver x64 and x64 DigiDriver.
Note:
These files are hidden, you need to enable Windows Explorer to view hidden files.


5. Enjoy!

                ____________________________________________________

Support the software creators ! [In fact no, they are assholes]

________________

Seed if you like ! (I need some help on this one - it's big-)
________________

Thanks to TEAM V.R, GAZ 51 and sovivoloko.
ABOD. MMXIII // FRANCE			


PS: I added a recovery record (5%) on the installation files, feel free to repair it if necessary.
